full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Title
Building Automation Control Systems for the Printing Shop - NCR
### Reference Number
WS4055271623-Doc4207099449
### Tender Closing Date
September 21, 2023, at 14:00:00

### Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking to acquire Building Automation Control Systems (BACS) for the Printing Shop located at 2455 Don Reid, National Capital Region (NCR), Canada.

### Description

The procurement is limited to selective tendering to contractors holding proprietary rights to the equipment used at the specified location.

### Specifications

* Award Process: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Contracting Entity: PSPC
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Contact Information:
  * Name: Quinn, Carine Thibodeau (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Email: carinethibodeau.quinn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  * Phone: Not provided

### Attachments

None.

### Important Dates
* Tender Closing Date: September 21, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 1, 2023
